title: set-smarthost settings
description: Set the settings of an external smarthost provider

username.title: username
username.description: Username to use the smarthost smtp

port.title: port
port.description: Port number of the smtp smarthost

host.title: host
host.description: Host name for the smarthost, like 'wiki.nethserver.org'

enabled.title: enabled
enabled.description: Enable or disable the smarthost settings

encrypt_smtp.title: encrypt_smtp
encrypt_smtp.description: Enable or disable the tls encryption with the smtp server

tls_verify.title: tls_verify
tls_verify.description: Enable or disable the usage of a valid certificate
